title: Welcome to the OSOM.Codex sandbox edition!
description: Great job! You already did the very first step - initialized and set your project environment. Please feel free to explore what you can do next.

release_notes.title: TODO next
items: Start exploring "dev/parea" and "dev/rarea" to learn more about code/folders structure you should follow for "Areas".
Start exploring "Demo -> Data" and "Demo -> CAD" at "dev/modules" to learn more about code/folders structure you should follow wile creating "Modules".
Explore "UI guidelines" to learn how to form standard forms and views.
Got it? So it's time to start creating your own module at "dev/modules"! Good luck!
